Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION

Title: Authorizes municipalities to offer real property tax credits to certain volunteers who live in one municipality but who serve in neighboring municipalities
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to offer real property tax credits to certain volunteers who live in one municipality but who serve in neighboring municipalities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to volunteer firefighter and ambulance credits
